message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.NE, cs.AI, cs.CL

The paper proposes a technique for improving the optimization and performance of neural networks, which is a common topic in machine learning and artificial intelligence research (cs.AI, cs.LG). The technique involves adding shortcut connections with a gating mechanism, which is often used in computer vision tasks (cs.CV). The paper also evaluates the technique on image classification datasets (CIFAR-10 and CIFAR-100), which further supports the relevance to computer vision (cs.CV). Finally, the paper discusses the design of shortcut connections, which is a topic in natural language processing (cs.CL) as well as computer vision (cs.CV).
